question: Which Indian sportsperson has clinched bronze in men's Greco-Roman 85kg category at the 2017 Asian Wrestling Championship?
explanation: Anil Kumar from India has clinched bronze medal in men\'s Greco-Roman 85kg category by defeating Uzbekistan\'s Muhammadali Shamsiddinov at the 2017 Asian Wrestling Championship at the KD Jadhav Indoor stadium in New Delhi. Apart from this, Jyoti won the bronze in women\'s 75kg category.
